languages.text: "Отдайте ему Горнило — пусть покоряет миры во славу Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Отдайте ему Горнило — пусть покоряет миры во славу Империума".

languages.text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."
languages.original_text: "Отдайте ему Горнило — пусть покоряет миры во славу Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."
"Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

"Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

languages.text: “把熔炉交给他，让他使用熔炉的力量，将其他世界也纳入帝国的怀抱之中。”
languages.original_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

traits.locale_text: “把熔炉交给他，让他使用熔炉的力量，将其他世界也纳入帝国的怀抱之中。”

languages.text: «Dale el Crisol, que lo use para traer mundos al redil del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

traits.locale_text: «Dale el Crisol, que lo use para traer mundos al redil del Imperium».

languages.text: 「坩堝を彼に与えよ...彼に、他の惑星を帝国の傘下に収めるようそれ使わせるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

traits.locale_text: 「坩堝を彼に与えよ...彼に、他の惑星を帝国の傘下に収めるようそれ使わせるんだ」

languages.text: « Confiez-lui le Creuset, il l'emploiera pour ramener de nombreux mondes dans le giron de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

traits.locale_text: « Confiez-lui le Creuset, il l'emploiera pour ramener de nombreux mondes dans le giron de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Gebt ihm den Tiegel — er soll damit Welten für das Imperium erobern."
languages.original_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt ihm den Tiegel — er soll damit Welten für das Imperium erobern."

languages.text: "Pota'yı ona verin. Bırakalım da onu dünyaları İmparatorluk cemaatine çekmek için kullansın."
languages.original_text: "Give the Crucible to him — let him use it to bring worlds into the Imperium's fold."
